message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the income statement, I can see a line item called "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period. This is the value I need to extract.

From the income statement:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 6720000.00 | 2024-01-28 |

The Cost of Goods Sold amount is 6720000.00, which represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '6720000.00'} }
```
